# Complete Event Hub Namespace Example

This example demonstrates a more comprehensive Event Hub Namespace configuration.

## Features

- Auto-inflate with maximum throughput units
- Network rule set (IP + VNet rules)
- Namespace authorization rules
- Diagnostic settings to Log Analytics

## Usage

```bash
terraform init
terraform plan
terraform apply
```

## Cleanup

```bash
terraform destroy
```
